main event: On August 19, 1950, a witness observed a flying saucer-shaped object near Bogalusa, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was reported to be about 40 to 50 feet long and about 400 to 500 feet in the air., The witness described the object as producing no sound and having no visible motor., The sighting lasted only a brief moment as the object disappeared rapidly., The sight was described as 'not a common sight', indicating rarity in such experiences., The witness's sister-in-law confirmed it was the first flying saucer they had seen.
witness description: a civilian living about 6 miles east of Bogalusa
